00014 Signal::Signal(const Signal & o):
00015   senderModuleID(o.senderModuleID), senderFromGateID(o.senderFromGateID), receiverModuleID(o.receiverModuleID), receiverToGateID(o.receiverToGateID),
00016   sendingStart(o.sendingStart), duration(o.duration),
00017   propagationDelay(o.propagationDelay),
00018   power(NULL), bitrate(NULL),
00019   txBitrate(NULL),
00020   attenuations(), rcvPower(NULL)
00021 {
00022   if (o.power) {
00023     power = o.power->constClone();
00024   }
00025 
00026   if (o.bitrate) {
00027     bitrate = o.bitrate->clone();
00028   }
00029 
00030   if (o.txBitrate) {
00031     txBitrate = o.txBitrate->clone();
00032   }
00033 
00034   for(ConstMappingList::const_iterator it = o.attenuations.begin();
00035     it != o.attenuations.end(); it++){
00036     attenuations.push_back((*it)->constClone());
00037   }
00038 }

00040 Signal& Signal::operator=(const Signal& o) {
00041   sendingStart     = o.sendingStart;
00042   duration         = o.duration;
00043   propagationDelay = o.propagationDelay;
00044   senderModuleID   = o.senderModuleID;
00045   senderFromGateID = o.senderFromGateID;
00046   receiverModuleID = o.receiverModuleID;
00047   receiverToGateID = o.receiverToGateID;
00048 
00049   markRcvPowerOutdated();
00050 
00051   if(power){
00052     delete power;
00053     power = NULL;
00054   }
00055 
00056   if(bitrate){
00057     delete bitrate;
00058     bitrate = NULL;
00059   }
00060 
00061   if(txBitrate){
00062     delete txBitrate;
00063     txBitrate = NULL;
00064   }
00065 
00066   if(o.power)
00067     power = o.power->constClone();
00068 
00069   if(o.bitrate)
00070     bitrate = o.bitrate->clone();
00071 
00072   if(o.txBitrate)
00073     txBitrate = o.txBitrate->clone();
00074 
00075   for(ConstMappingList::const_iterator it = attenuations.begin();
00076     it != attenuations.end(); ++it){
00077     delete(*it);
00078   }
00079 
00080   attenuations.clear();
00081 
00082   for(ConstMappingList::const_iterator it = o.attenuations.begin();
00083     it != o.attenuations.end(); ++it){
00084     attenuations.push_back((*it)->constClone());
00085   }
00086 
00087   return *this;
00088 }

00090 void Signal::swap(Signal& s) {
00091   std::swap(senderModuleID,   s.senderModuleID);
00092   std::swap(senderFromGateID, s.senderFromGateID);
00093   std::swap(receiverModuleID, s.receiverModuleID);
00094   std::swap(receiverToGateID, s.receiverToGateID);
00095   std::swap(sendingStart,     s.sendingStart);
00096   std::swap(duration,         s.duration);
00097   std::swap(propagationDelay, s.propagationDelay);
00098   std::swap(power,            s.power);
00099   std::swap(bitrate,          s.bitrate);
00100   std::swap(txBitrate,        s.txBitrate);
00101   std::swap(attenuations,     s.attenuations);
00102   std::swap(rcvPower,         s.rcvPower);
00103 }

00105 Signal::~Signal()
00106 {
00107   if(rcvPower){
00108     if(propagationDelay != 0){
00109       assert(rcvPower->getRefMapping() != power);
00110       delete rcvPower->getRefMapping();
00111     }
00112 
00113     delete rcvPower;
00114   }
00115 
00116   if(power)
00117     delete power;
00118 
00119   if(bitrate)
00120     delete bitrate;
00121 
00122   if(txBitrate)
00123     delete txBitrate;
00124 
00125   for(ConstMappingList::iterator it = attenuations.begin();
00126     it != attenuations.end(); it++) {
00127 
00128     delete *it;
00129   }
00130 }

00136 simtime_t Signal::getSendingEnd() const {
00137   return sendingStart + duration;

00140 simtime_t Signal::getReceptionStart() const {
00141   return sendingStart + propagationDelay;

00145   return sendingStart + propagationDelay + duration;

00156 void Signal::setPropagationDelay(simtime_t_cref delay) {
00157   assert(propagationDelay == 0);
00158   assert(!txBitrate);
00159 
00160   markRcvPowerOutdated();
00161 
00162   propagationDelay = delay;
00163 
00164   if(bitrate) {
00165     txBitrate = bitrate;
00166     bitrate = new DelayedMapping(txBitrate, propagationDelay);
00167   }
00168 }

00170 void Signal::setTransmissionPower(ConstMapping *power)
00171 {
00172   if(this->power){
00173     markRcvPowerOutdated();
00174     delete this->power;
00175   }
00176 
00177   this->power = power;
00178 }

00180 void Signal::setBitrate(Mapping *bitrate)
00181 {
00182   assert(!txBitrate);
00183 
00184   if(this->bitrate)
00185     delete this->bitrate;
00186 
00187   this->bitrate = bitrate;
00188 }

00190 cGate *Signal::getSendingGate() const
00191 {
00192     if (senderFromGateID < 0) return NULL;
00193     cModule *const mod = getSendingModule();
00194     return !mod ? NULL : mod->gate(senderFromGateID);
00195 }
00196 
00197 cGate *Signal::getReceptionGate() const
00198 {
00199     if (receiverToGateID < 0) return NULL;
00200     cModule *const mod = getReceptionModule();
00201     return !mod ? NULL : mod->gate(receiverToGateID);
00202 }
00203 
00204 void Signal::setReceptionSenderInfo(const cMessage *const pMsg)
00205 {
00206   if (!pMsg)
00207     return;
00208 
00209   assert(senderModuleID < 0);
00210 
00211   senderModuleID   = pMsg->getSenderModuleId();
00212   senderFromGateID = pMsg->getSenderGateId();
00213 
00214   receiverModuleID = pMsg->getArrivalModuleId();
00215   receiverToGateID = pMsg->getArrivalGateId();
00216 }
